clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: As of July 2013 there is no approved therapeutic indication for 2 deoxyglucose 2 deoxyglucose may have several potential indications as an adjunct to chemotherapy and radiotherapy in the treatment of solid tumors as an antiviral treatment in herpes simplex patients and as an antiepileptic in temporal lobe epilepsy patients

contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Physiologically 2 deoxyglucose is an inhibitor of glycolysis certain viruses and seizures
